tasks.question_text: Read the following answers from the website of a driving school. Your task is to match the question (A-M) to the appropriate answer. For 0): "Yes, you must be at least 17 years old to start learning to drive a car."
options: A) What if I need to cancel my lesson?
B) What should I do if I fail my driving test?
C) Are there any age restrictions for learning to drive?
D) What's the best time of day to take my lessons?
E) Can I change my driving test appointment?
F) How many lessons will it take for me to learn to drive?
G) Can I be picked up and dropped off anywhere?
H) Can I learn to drive in my own car?
I) How can I book a driving test?
K) What are L-plates?
L) Can I choose my instructor?
M) How often should I take driving lessons?
tasks.explanation: A 17 éves életkorra vonatkozó válasz közvetlenül ahhoz a kérdéshez kapcsolódik, amely az életkori megkötésekről szól a vezetés tanulásához (C).

tasks.question_text: Answer 1): "On average, one needs between 20 and 40 hours of professional instruction to become test ready, but every learner is different. Some may need more, while others may need fewer lessons."
options: A) What if I need to cancel my lesson?
B) What should I do if I fail my driving test?
C) Are there any age restrictions for learning to drive?
D) What's the best time of day to take my lessons?
E) Can I change my driving test appointment?
F) How many lessons will it take for me to learn to drive?
G) Can I be picked up and dropped off anywhere?
H) Can I learn to drive in my own car?
I) How can I book a driving test?
K) What are L-plates?
L) Can I choose my instructor?
M) How often should I take driving lessons?
tasks.explanation: Ez a válasz a szükséges oktatási órák számát részletezi, ami egyezik a „Hány óra kell a vezetés megtanulásához?” kérdéssel.

tasks.question_text: Answer 2): "It is possible but it depends on your instructor. Certain driving instructors only teach in their own cars, which are fitted with dual controls: a set of extra pedals on the passenger's side, allowing the instructor to assist in emergencies."
options: A) What if I need to cancel my lesson?
B) What should I do if I fail my driving test?
C) Are there any age restrictions for learning to drive?
D) What's the best time of day to take my lessons?
E) Can I change my driving test appointment?
F) How many lessons will it take for me to learn to drive?
G) Can I be picked up and dropped off anywhere?
H) Can I learn to drive in my own car?
I) How can I book a driving test?
K) What are L-plates?
L) Can I choose my instructor?
M) How often should I take driving lessons?
tasks.explanation: A válasz a saját autóban történő tanulás lehetőségével foglalkozik, és megemlíti a kettős pedálrendszert (dual controls).

tasks.question_text: Answer 3): "Driving lessons during the daytime are the best choice because more instructors are available and there's better visibility than in the evenings."
options: A) What if I need to cancel my lesson?
B) What should I do if I fail my driving test?
C) Are there any age restrictions for learning to drive?
D) What's the best time of day to take my lessons?
E) Can I change my driving test appointment?
F) How many lessons will it take for me to learn to drive?
G) Can I be picked up and dropped off anywhere?
H) Can I learn to drive in my own car?
I) How can I book a driving test?
K) What are L-plates?
L) Can I choose my instructor?
M) How often should I take driving lessons?
tasks.explanation: A válasz a nappali órák választásának okait sorolja fel, illeszkedik a „Melyik napszak a legjobb...” kérdéshez.

tasks.question_text: Answer 4): "Yes, as long as the requested location is within our working area, and provided this is arranged with your instructor well before your lesson."
options: A) What if I need to cancel my lesson?
B) What should I do if I fail my driving test?
C) Are there any age restrictions for learning to drive?
D) What's the best time of day to take my lessons?
E) Can I change my driving test appointment?
F) How many lessons will it take for me to learn to drive?
G) Can I be picked up and dropped off anywhere?
H) Can I learn to drive in my own car?
I) How can I book a driving test?
K) What are L-plates?
L) Can I choose my instructor?
M) How often should I take driving lessons?
tasks.explanation: A válasz meghatározza a fel- és leszállás feltételeit egy adott helyen, ami megegyezik a „Felvehetnek és letehetnek engem bárhol?” kérdéssel.

tasks.question_text: Answer 5): "It's recommended to take at least one or two lessons per week to maintain progress and remember information."
options: A) What if I need to cancel my lesson?
B) What should I do if I fail my driving test?
C) Are there any age restrictions for learning to drive?
D) What's the best time of day to take my lessons?
E) Can I change my driving test appointment?
F) How many lessons will it take for me to learn to drive?
G) Can I be picked up and dropped off anywhere?
H) Can I learn to drive in my own car?
I) How can I book a driving test?
K) What are L-plates?
L) Can I choose my instructor?
M) How often should I take driving lessons?
tasks.explanation: Ez a javaslat a tanórák gyakoriságára vonatkozóan összhangban van a „Milyen gyakran vegyek vezetési órát?” kérdéssel.

tasks.question_text: Answer 6): "Certainly. You can view our instructors' profiles on our website including a short bio about them and a picture of the car you'll learn to drive in."
options: A) What if I need to cancel my lesson?
B) What should I do if I fail my driving test?
C) Are there any age restrictions for learning to drive?
D) What's the best time of day to take my lessons?
E) Can I change my driving test appointment?
F) How many lessons will it take for me to learn to drive?
G) Can I be picked up and dropped off anywhere?
H) Can I learn to drive in my own car?
I) How can I book a driving test?
K) What are L-plates?
L) Can I choose my instructor?
M) How often should I take driving lessons?
tasks.explanation: A válasz elmagyarázza, hogyan választhat valaki oktatót a profiljuk megtekintésével.

tasks.question_text: Answer 7): "Take note of the examiner's feedback and discuss it with your instructor. Focus on practising the areas where you need to improve before retaking the test."
options: A) What if I need to cancel my lesson?
B) What should I do if I fail my driving test?
C) Are there any age restrictions for learning to drive?
D) What's the best time of day to take my lessons?
E) Can I change my driving test appointment?
F) How many lessons will it take for me to learn to drive?
G) Can I be picked up and dropped off anywhere?
H) Can I learn to drive in my own car?
I) How can I book a driving test?
K) What are L-plates?
L) Can I choose my instructor?
M) How often should I take driving lessons?
tasks.explanation: A tanácsot azoknak adják, akik megbuktak a vezetésvizsgán.

tasks.question_text: Answer 8): "They are signs that must be displayed on the front and back of a vehicle when a learner driver is behind the wheel. They indicate that the driver is still learning."
options: A) What if I need to cancel my lesson?
B) What should I do if I fail my driving test?
C) Are there any age restrictions for learning to drive?
D) What's the best time of day to take my lessons?
E) Can I change my driving test appointment?
F) How many lessons will it take for me to learn to drive?
G) Can I be picked up and dropped off anywhere?
H) Can I learn to drive in my own car?
I) How can I book a driving test?
K) What are L-plates?
L) Can I choose my instructor?
M) How often should I take driving lessons?
tasks.explanation: A leírás tökéletesen definiálja az L-táblákat.

tasks.question_text: Many popular foods that people eat at Christmas are unsafe for dogs and shouldn't (0) _______________.
options: A) contains higher doses
B) advise keeping these out of their reach
C) be fed to them
D) be given any alcohol
E) hide your dog's usual biscuits
F) be taken to the vet immediately
G) break into sharp pieces
H) get your dog an active present
I) have difficulty breathing
K) cause stomach problems for your pets
L) avoid giving them certain things
tasks.explanation: A példa közvetlenül a kutyák etetésére vonatkozó cselekvésre utal, így a „nem szabad odaadni nekik” a megfelelő.

tasks.question_text: ...so we need to be careful to (9) _______________ what should be avoided...
options: A) contains higher doses
B) advise keeping these out of their reach
C) be fed to them
D) be given any alcohol
E) hide your dog's usual biscuits
F) be taken to the vet immediately
G) break into sharp pieces
H) get your dog an active present
I) have difficulty breathing
K) cause stomach problems for your pets
L) avoid giving them certain things
tasks.explanation: A mondat óvatosságra inti az embert, hogy „mit kell kerülni”, ami arra utal, hogy „bizonyos dolgok elkerülése” a válasz.

tasks.question_text: Dark chocolate (10) _______________ and is regarded as more toxic.
options: A) contains higher doses
B) advise keeping these out of their reach
C) be fed to them
D) be given any alcohol
E) hide your dog's usual biscuits
F) be taken to the vet immediately
G) break into sharp pieces
H) get your dog an active present
I) have difficulty breathing
K) cause stomach problems for your pets
L) avoid giving them certain things
tasks.explanation: Az étcsokoládé toxicitása azzal függ össze, hogy 'magasabb dózisokat' tartalmaz káros anyagokból, mint például a teobromin.

tasks.question_text: ...causes pets to become restless and (11) _______________.
options: A) contains higher doses
B) advise keeping these out of their reach
C) be fed to them
D) be given any alcohol
E) hide your dog's usual biscuits
F) be taken to the vet immediately
G) break into sharp pieces
H) get your dog an active present
I) have difficulty breathing
K) cause stomach problems for your pets
L) avoid giving them certain things
tasks.explanation: A koffeint tartalmazó csokoládé nyugtalansághoz és 'légzési nehézségekhez' vezethet háziállatoknál.

tasks.question_text: ...It's not known what effect they have on cats, but vets (12) _______________.
options: A) contains higher doses
B) advise keeping these out of their reach
C) be fed to them
D) be given any alcohol
E) hide your dog's usual biscuits
F) be taken to the vet immediately
G) break into sharp pieces
H) get your dog an active present
I) have difficulty breathing
K) cause stomach problems for your pets
L) avoid giving them certain things
tasks.explanation: A bizonytalanságot figyelembe véve az állatorvosok azt tanácsolnák, hogy 'tartsák ezeket tőlük távol'.

tasks.question_text: Raw garlic and onions can (13) _______________ if they eat them in large quantities.
options: A) contains higher doses
B) advise keeping these out of their reach
C) be fed to them
D) be given any alcohol
E) hide your dog's usual biscuits
F) be taken to the vet immediately
G) break into sharp pieces
H) get your dog an active present
I) have difficulty breathing
K) cause stomach problems for your pets
L) avoid giving them certain things
tasks.explanation: A fokhagyma és a hagyma köztudottan 'gyomorproblémákat okoz háziállatoknak'.

tasks.question_text: Cooked bones aren't suitable for your cat or dog as they can (14) _______________ which might cause damage to their insides.
options: A) contains higher doses
B) advise keeping these out of their reach
C) be fed to them
D) be given any alcohol
E) hide your dog's usual biscuits
F) be taken to the vet immediately
G) break into sharp pieces
H) get your dog an active present
I) have difficulty breathing
K) cause stomach problems for your pets
L) avoid giving them certain things
tasks.explanation: A főtt csontok szétaprózódhatnak és 'éles darabokra törhetnek', károsítva a háziállat belső szerveit.

tasks.question_text: Experts suggest that rather than always looking for foodie treats, you should (15) _______________.
options: A) contains higher doses
B) advise keeping these out of their reach
C) be fed to them
D) be given any alcohol
E) hide your dog's usual biscuits
F) be taken to the vet immediately
G) break into sharp pieces
H) get your dog an active present
I) have difficulty breathing
K) cause stomach problems for your pets
L) avoid giving them certain things
tasks.explanation: A szöveg új játékot vagy hosszú sétát javasol a finomságok helyett, így a „kutyájának aktív ajándékot szerezhet” a megfelelő.

tasks.question_text: If you want to have some surprises, just (16) _______________ in leftover boxes and let them sniff them out!
options: A) contains higher doses
B) advise keeping these out of their reach
C) be fed to them
D) be given any alcohol
E) hide your dog's usual biscuits
F) be taken to the vet immediately
G) break into sharp pieces
H) get your dog an active present
I) have difficulty breathing
K) cause stomach problems for your pets
L) avoid giving them certain things
tasks.explanation: A „meglepetések” szaglászással történő megvalósításához elrejtené a kutyájának szokásos kekszét, hogy megtalálja.

tasks.question_text: Match the following opening sentences (A-K) to the correct paragraphs. For 0): "It's scary being away from home in a new place with people you don't know well yet. Or maybe your course is super challenging. These tips can help you look after your mental health."
options: A) Create a budget.
B) Register at the nearest surgery.
C) When you're starting uni, looking after yourself can be tough.
D) Stick to a basic routine.
E) Find a balance between study and life.
F) Try to make new friends.
G) Plan activities that don't involve spending money.
H) Reflect on your emotions.
I) Find out what support your uni offers.
K) Talk to someone you know well and trust.
tasks.explanation: Ez a mondat (C) általános bevezető mondatként szolgál az egyetemi öngondoskodási tippekhez, lefedve az egyetemen tapasztalható lehetséges nehézségek átfogó témáját.

tasks.question_text: Paragraph 17): "It's important not to struggle in silence. Opening up can be difficult but remember you're not alone. Schedule regular chats with family or friends back home."
options: A) Create a budget.
B) Register at the nearest surgery.
C) When you're starting uni, looking after yourself can be tough.
D) Stick to a basic routine.
E) Find a balance between study and life.
F) Try to make new friends.
G) Plan activities that don't involve spending money.
H) Reflect on your emotions.
I) Find out what support your uni offers.
K) Talk to someone you know well and trust.
tasks.explanation: A bekezdés a kommunikációra és a támogatás elfogadására ösztönöz, ami megegyezik a „Beszéljen valakivel, akit jól ismer és megbízik benne” (K) lehetőséggel.

tasks.question_text: Paragraph 18): "Most universities have helplines and counselling services. Search on the website to find out what is available at your university."
options: A) Create a budget.
B) Register at the nearest surgery.
C) When you're starting uni, looking after yourself can be tough.
D) Stick to a basic routine.
E) Find a balance between study and life.
F) Try to make new friends.
G) Plan activities that don't involve spending money.
H) Reflect on your emotions.
I) Find out what support your uni offers.
K) Talk to someone you know well and trust.
tasks.explanation: A bekezdés az egyetemi támogatási szolgáltatások felkutatását javasolja, összhangban a „Tudja meg, milyen támogatást nyújt az egyeteme” (I) lehetőséggel.

tasks.question_text: Paragraph 19): "Even if you don't need a doctor right now, it's a good idea to contact one so you can get help when you need it."
options: A) Create a budget.
B) Register at the nearest surgery.
C) When you're starting uni, looking after yourself can be tough.
D) Stick to a basic routine.
E) Find a balance between study and life.
F) Try to make new friends.
G) Plan activities that don't involve spending money.
H) Reflect on your emotions.
I) Find out what support your uni offers.
K) Talk to someone you know well and trust.
tasks.explanation: Az a tanács, hogy proaktívan vegye fel a kapcsolatot egy orvossal, még mielőtt szüksége lenne rá, a „Regisztráljon a legközelebbi rendelőnél” (B) pontra utal.

tasks.question_text: Paragraph 20): "This is especially important when everything is changing. Try to sleep enough, eat a balanced diet, and exercise when you can. These small things make a big difference to your mental health."
options: A) Create a budget.
B) Register at the nearest surgery.
C) When you're starting uni, looking after yourself can be tough.
D) Stick to a basic routine.
E) Find a balance between study and life.
F) Try to make new friends.
G) Plan activities that don't involve spending money.
H) Reflect on your emotions.
I) Find out what support your uni offers.
K) Talk to someone you know well and trust.
tasks.explanation: A bekezdés az egészséges szokásokra, mint az alvás, étrend és testmozgás, fókuszál, és azt javasolja, hogy „Tartson be egy alapvető rutint” (D).

tasks.question_text: Paragraph 21): "Take breaks away from your desk, when you do something fun. Uni is about enjoying yourself as well as studying."
options: A) Create a budget.
B) Register at the nearest surgery.
C) When you're starting uni, looking after yourself can be tough.
D) Stick to a basic routine.
E) Find a balance between study and life.
F) Try to make new friends.
G) Plan activities that don't involve spending money.
H) Reflect on your emotions.
I) Find out what support your uni offers.
K) Talk to someone you know well and trust.
tasks.explanation: A tanulás mellett a szórakoztató tevékenységek élvezetére vonatkozó tanács az élet és a tanulmányok közötti egyensúly megtalálásának szükségességét sugallja (E).

tasks.question_text: Paragraph 22): "If writing is your thing, keeping a diary will be helpful to track how you're feeling."
options: A) Create a budget.
B) Register at the nearest surgery.
C) When you're starting uni, looking after yourself can be tough.
D) Stick to a basic routine.
E) Find a balance between study and life.
F) Try to make new friends.
G) Plan activities that don't involve spending money.
H) Reflect on your emotions.
I) Find out what support your uni offers.
K) Talk to someone you know well and trust.
tasks.explanation: A naplóvezetés az érzések nyomon követésére az „érzelmeken való elmélkedés” (H) egyik módszere.

tasks.question_text: Paragraph 23): "It's normal to find it hard to socialize at first but keep trying. Try setting up fun activities with your housemates like game nights or watching a show together. You could also join a society to meet people."
options: A) Create a budget.
B) Register at the nearest surgery.
C) When you're starting uni, looking after yourself can be tough.
D) Stick to a basic routine.
E) Find a balance between study and life.
F) Try to make new friends.
G) Plan activities that don't involve spending money.
H) Reflect on your emotions.
I) Find out what support your uni offers.
K) Talk to someone you know well and trust.
tasks.explanation: A bekezdés tippeket ad a szocializációhoz és a tevékenységekhez való csatlakozáshoz, ami közvetlenül kapcsolódik az „Próbáljon meg új barátokat szerezni” (F) lehetőséghez.

tasks.question_text: Statement 0): Mr. Littman's first marriage ended with a divorce.
options: A) TRUE
B) FALSE
C) THE TEXT DOES NOT SAY
tasks.explanation: A szöveg szerint „partnerük meghalt”, ami azt jelzi, hogy a házasság halál miatt ért véget, nem válás miatt. Ezért hamis.

tasks.question_text: Statement 24): Ms. Fiterman and Mr. Littman had lived in different states before they moved to the retirement home in Philadelphia.
options: A) TRUE
B) FALSE
C) THE TEXT DOES NOT SAY
tasks.explanation: A szöveg nem ad információt arról, hol éltek Philadelphiába költözésük előtt, csak arról, hogy mindketten ugyanabba a nyugdíjas otthonba költöztek oda. Ezért a szöveg nem állít ilyet.

tasks.question_text: Statement 25): Ms. Fiterman and Mr. Littman remembered being in touch during their university years.
options: A) TRUE
B) FALSE
C) THE TEXT DOES NOT SAY
tasks.explanation: A szöveg kifejezetten kimondja, hogy „akkor nem találkoztak egymással”, annak ellenére, hogy ugyanabban az időben jártak egyetemre. Ezért ez az állítás hamis.

tasks.question_text: Statement 26): The couple had their first date outside the retirement home.
options: A) TRUE
B) FALSE
C) THE TEXT DOES NOT SAY
tasks.explanation: A szöveg megemlíti, hogy egy jelmezbálon találkoztak a nyugdíjas otthonban, de nem pontosítja, hogy az első randevújuk az intézményen belül vagy kívül történt. Ezért a szöveg nem állít ilyet.

tasks.question_text: Statement 27): Mr. Littman's family were pleased to find out about the old man's relationship.
options: A) TRUE
B) FALSE
C) THE TEXT DOES NOT SAY
tasks.explanation: A szöveg kifejezetten kijelenti: „A családja örült, hogy talált valakit, akibe beleszeretett.” Ez az állítás igaz.

tasks.question_text: Statement 28): Mr. Littman's decision to get married surprised his family.
options: A) TRUE
B) FALSE
C) THE TEXT DOES NOT SAY
tasks.explanation: A szöveg szerint: „Bár a pár kilenc évig randevúzott, a család sosem gondolta volna, hogy össze akarnak házasodni.” Ez azt jelzi, hogy a döntés meglepő volt, így az állítás igaz.

tasks.question_text: Statement 29): Mr. Littman had more children than Ms. Fiterman.
options: A) TRUE
B) FALSE
C) THE TEXT DOES NOT SAY
tasks.explanation: A szöveg részletezi Mr. Littman családját (gyerekek, unokák, dédunokák) az esküvőn, de nem ad információt Ms. Fiterman családjáról, így a szöveg nem állít ilyet.

tasks.question_text: Statement 30): The couple were awarded the Guinness world record because Mr. Littman was the oldest man ever to get married.
options: A) TRUE
B) FALSE
C) THE TEXT DOES NOT SAY
tasks.explanation: A szöveg szerint ők lettek „a világ legidősebb házaspárja, kombinált életkoruk meghaladja a 202 évet”. A rekord a kombinált életkorra vonatkozik, nem arra, hogy Mr. Littman volt a valaha házasodó legidősebb férfi. Ezért hamis.

tasks.question_text: These days (0) _______________ people can type faster than they can write by hand...
options: A) plenty
B) lot of
C) many
D) few
tasks.explanation: A „many” (sok) a legmegfelelőbb mennyiségjelző, ha nagyszámú emberről beszélünk.

tasks.question_text: ...particularly (10) _______________ they've grown up using laptops.
options: A) that
B) if
C) then
D) how
tasks.explanation: A mondatrész egy feltételt vagy feltételezést vezet be: „különösen, ha laptopokon nőttek fel”.

tasks.question_text: ...useful skill and allows you to take notes quickly and easily, (11) _______________ must certainly be a good thing.
options: A) which
B) it
C) what
D) that
tasks.explanation: A „which” egy nem-korlátozó vonatkozó mellékmondatot vezet be, visszautalva az előző állításra, miszerint a képesség hasznos a gyors és egyszerű jegyzetkészítéshez.

tasks.question_text: ...by hand had no (12) _______________ to concentrate on the information to allow them to summarise.
options: A) more chance
B) difficulty in
C) possibility
D) choice but
tasks.explanation: A „had no choice but to concentrate” (nem volt más választásuk, mint koncentrálni) kifejezés arra utal, hogy az írás lassabb tempója arra kényszerítette őket, hogy alaposabban dolgozzák fel az információkat, illeszkedve a „no X to concentrate…” (nem volt X a koncentrációra) kontextushoz.

tasks.question_text: but when (13) _______________ asked to explain the concepts covered in the lecture...
options: A) it was
B) the teacher
D) all of them
tasks.explanation: Angolul egy redukált mellékmondat (participial clause), mint a „When asked to explain…” (amikor megkérdezték tőle, hogy magyarázza el…), gyakran elhagyja az alanyt (pl. „they were asked” – megkérdezték őket), így egy kötőjel jelzi, hogy nincs szükség további szóra, ami ezt az implicit szerkezetet reprezentálja.

tasks.question_text: When the students (14) _______________ allowed to revise from their notes before being tested a week later...
options: A) had
B) were
C) would be
D) have been
tasks.explanation: Ez passzív szerkezetet alkot: „the students were allowed to revise” (a diákoknak engedélyezték, hogy ismételjenek).

tasks.question_text: The reason (15) _______________ when using a pen and paper, you process the information more deeply...
options: A) why is
B) for that
C) is that
D) for which
tasks.explanation: Az „The reason is that…” (Az ok az, hogy…) kifejezés egy bevett módja egy magyarázat bevezetésének.

tasks.question_text: ...you process the information more deeply (16) _______________ you can't possibly write it all down.
options: A) while
B) because
C) however,
D) in case
tasks.explanation: A „Because” (mivel) vezeti be az információ alaposabb feldolgozásának okát: azt, hogy nem lehet mindent leírni.
